amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to authorize a Department of Interior Casualty Assistance Program to provide assistance to firefighters and the families of firefighters who were critically injured, ill, or killed in the line-of-duty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
